majors.magician.name: The Magician
majors.magician.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, you must reroll 1 card (choose).
majors.magician.gift: Gift: Reroll 1 revealed card for free.
majors.high_priestess.name: The High Priestess
majors.high_priestess.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, you must exile + replace 1 card (choose).
majors.high_priestess.gift: Gift: Peek the top 3 cards of the Minor deck and reorder them.
majors.empress.name: The Empress
majors.empress.shadow: Shadow: At floor start, bargain: pay 5 Gold or take 3 damage.
majors.empress.gift: Gift: Bargain: pay 5 Gold to heal 5, or take 3 damage to gain 5 Gold.
majors.emperor.name: The Emperor
majors.emperor.shadow: Shadow (Order): In engaged rooms, choose carried card first, then resolve remaining cards left-to-right.
majors.emperor.gift: Gift: Cheat-weapon for your next enemy fight.
majors.hierophant.name: The Hierophant
majors.hierophant.shadow: Shadow (Order): In engaged rooms, choose carried card first, then resolve remaining cards in suit order (Cups → Pentacles → Swords → Wands).
majors.hierophant.gift: Gift: Cleanse 1 revealed card for free.
majors.lovers.name: The Lovers
majors.lovers.shadow: Shadow: Once per room, Fate cleanse is disabled.
majors.lovers.gift: Gift: Exile + replace 1 revealed card for free.
majors.chariot.name: The Chariot
majors.chariot.shadow: Shadow (Order): At floor start, choose a direction. In engaged rooms, choose carried card first, then resolve remaining cards in that direction.
majors.chariot.gift: Gift: Exile + replace 1 revealed card for free.
majors.chariot.directionPrompt: Choose a direction for this floor:
majors.strength.name: Strength
majors.strength.shadow: Shadow: This floor, weapon restriction is strict (must be strictly lower, not equal).
majors.strength.gift: Gift: Cheat-weapon for one enemy fight.
majors.hermit.name: The Hermit
majors.hermit.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, you must peek top 3 Minor cards (no reorder).
majors.hermit.gift: Gift: Peek the top 3 Minor cards and reorder them.
majors.wheel.name: Wheel of Fortune
majors.wheel.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, reroll 1 random card.
majors.wheel.gift: Gift: Reroll 1 revealed card for free.
majors.justice.name: Justice
majors.justice.shadow: Shadow (Order): In engaged rooms, choose carried card first, then resolve remaining cards in ascending value order.
majors.justice.gift: Gift: Cleanse 1 revealed card for free.
majors.hanged_man.name: The Hanged Man
majors.hanged_man.shadow: Shadow: Once per room, the first card you would resolve is exiled + replaced instead.
majors.hanged_man.gift: Gift: Exile + replace 1 revealed card for free.
majors.death.name: Death
majors.death.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, exile + replace 1 random card.
majors.death.gift: Gift: Exile + replace 1 revealed card for free.
majors.temperance.name: Temperance
majors.temperance.shadow: Shadow: Once per room, Fate reroll is disabled.
majors.temperance.gift: Gift: Bargain: pay 5 Gold to heal 5, or take 3 damage to gain 5 Gold.
majors.devil.name: The Devil
majors.devil.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, choose: exile + replace 1 card, or bargain (take 3 damage to gain 5 Gold).
majors.devil.gift: Gift: Strong bargain: pay 8 Gold to heal 8, or take 4 damage to gain 8 Gold.
majors.devil.bargainOption: Bargain: take 3 damage to gain 5 Gold
majors.tower.name: The Tower
majors.tower.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, reroll the highest-value card (choose among ties).
majors.tower.gift: Gift: Reroll 1 revealed card for free.
majors.star.name: The Star
majors.star.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, if any are reversed, you must cleanse 1 of them.
majors.star.gift: Gift: Cleanse 1 revealed card for free.
majors.moon.name: The Moon
majors.moon.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, reroll the leftmost card.
majors.moon.gift: Gift: Peek the top 3 Minor cards and reorder them.
majors.sun.name: The Sun
majors.sun.shadow: Shadow: After resolving your first card, bargain: pay 2 Gold or take 1 damage.
majors.sun.gift: Gift: Bargain: pay 5 Gold to heal 5, or take 3 damage to gain 5 Gold.
majors.judgement.name: Judgement
majors.judgement.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, if any enemy is present, you must exile + replace 1 card of your choice.
majors.judgement.gift: Gift: Exile + replace 1 revealed card for free.
majors.world.name: The World
majors.world.shadow: Shadow: After revealing 4 cards, reorder room cards by value (low to high).
majors.world.gift: Gift: Reorder the 4 revealed room cards however you like.
